name: Più, a bird song
description:
Più, a bird song is a game about a bird that wants to keep the music, essential element for its world to exist, alive. Explore a mystical world, seek for the 4 Ancient Songbirds, and save Life itself by bringing them back to where they belong.
But beware! Those birds are fragile, so feed them with magical gems on your way back to keep them alive and singing.

The team strongly recommands to play the game with a headset, or at least with sound turned on, as it strongly relies on music and sound to be experienced fully. We hope you'll enjoy this experience!

Credits:

- Louis Denizet - *Game Developer*
- Romain Rope - *Music & Sound Design*
- Mathieu Clavel - *Game Design & Art*
